platforms.name: DeepSeek
platforms.description: DeepSeek is an open-source large language model platform developed by DeepSeek AI, offering state-of-the-art reasoning capabilities with its 671B parameter model that rivals proprietary alternatives like GPT-4. It provides both cloud API access and self-hosted deployment options, making it suitable for enterprises, researchers, and developers seeking cost-effective, high-performance AI. Its unique value lies in its strong performance in complex reasoning, mathematics, and coding tasks while being fully open-source and supporting extensive context windows.
keyFeatures: 671B parameter model with advanced reasoning capabilities
128K token context window for long-form content
Strong performance in code generation, debugging, and mathematical reasoning

platforms.name: 01.AI
platforms.description: 01.AI is a prominent Chinese AI research and development company that creates and deploys large language models (LLMs). It is best known for its Yi series of models, which are optimized for bilingual Chinese-English understanding and excel in specialized tasks like coding, mathematics, and complex reasoning. The company uniquely offers both powerful open-source models and proprietary, enterprise-grade solutions, targeting developers and businesses seeking high-performance, cost-effective AI deployment.
keyFeatures: Yi series LLMs (e.g., Yi-34B, Yi-6B) with strong bilingual (Chinese/English) capabilities
State-of-the-art performance on coding benchmarks (e.g., HumanEval, MBPP) and mathematical reasoning (e.g., MATH)
Full open-source release of model weights and code under Apache 2.0 license for specific models

platforms.name: Claude 4
platforms.description: Claude 4 is Anthropic's most advanced large language model, designed as a high-performance AI assistant for complex reasoning, creative tasks, and technical work like coding and analysis. It is targeted at professionals, developers, and enterprises, offering a unique combination of a massive 200K token context window, state-of-the-art reasoning capabilities, and a strong constitutional AI safety framework that makes it reliable and steerable for critical applications.
keyFeatures: 200,000 token context window for processing long documents and conversations
Advanced reasoning and analysis capabilities for complex problem-solving
Proficient code generation and debugging in multiple programming languages

platforms.name: Reka Core v2
platforms.description: A new state-of-the-art multimodal frontier model from Reka AI, competitive with the best models from OpenAI and Google. Excels in complex reasoning, multilingual understanding, and long-context tasks.
